name: columbia
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the capital city of the US state of South Carolina: The Carolinas may conjure thoughts of textile mills and tobacco fields, but Columbia has a diverse economy. He happened to be in Columbia, South Carolina, during the worst of the torrential rain and flooding.
More examplesFewer examplesShe grew up in Columbia.He spent five years working as a nurse in Columbia.The State is a daily newspaper published in Columbia, South Carolina.He also studied law at Columbia College, Columbia, South Carolina, for less than a year.
